headline: Show HN: CharityStack|Stripe Atlas for charities|formation, fundraising, banking
description:
Hey HackerNews!

I'm Mubarrat, one of the founders of CharityStack. CharityStack is a platform for anyone to form a nonprofit, fundraise their first dollar, and set up their bank account. We want to make it seamless for anyone and everyone to start a charity and make an impact.

Why build CharityStack? Before CharityStack, my team and I attempted to create a charity and it was an absolutely terrible process. It took us nearly two years, a couple of thousands of dollars, and a bunch of headaches in between. We quickly realized that we weren't the only ones that had this problem, but something widespread whenever anyone attempts to create a charity.

With Charity Stack you can:

Form your nonprofit: - State Incorporation - Federal EIN - Bylaws - Conflict of Interest Policy - Solicitation of Funds Certificate - 501c3 Application

Fundraise your first dollar: - Credit Card Transactions - Bank Transfer - Apple Pay - Google Pay - Paypal & Venmo - Reoccurring Donations

Set up your bank account: - Checking Account - Virtual Debit Cards - Physical Debit Cards - Wire, ACH, Checks - Investment Account - FDIC Insured up to $250,000

For a limited time, we're waiving fundraising and banking stack pricing for a year for the first 25 charities, just make sure to sign up on the link below

We have a waitlist up on our website here: https://www.charitystack.com/sign-up
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: CharityStack|Stripe Atlas for charities|formation, fundraising, banking
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: CharityStack|Stripe Atlas for charities|formation, fundraising, banking
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HackerNews！

我是CharityStack的创始人之一Mubarrat。CharityStack是一个平台，任何人都可以组建一个非营利组织，筹集他们的第一笔资金，并建立他们的银行账户。我们希望让任何人和每个人都能无缝地启动一个慈善机构并产生影响。

为什么要建立CharityStack？ 在CharityStack之前，我和我的团队曾试图创建一个慈善机构，这绝对是一个糟糕的过程。我们花了将近两年的时间，花了几千美元，中间还经历了一堆令人头痛的事情。我们很快就意识到，我们并不是唯一有这个问题的人，而是每当有人试图创建一个慈善机构时，都会普遍存在这个问题。

通过Charity Stack，你可以：

组建你的非营利组织。 - 成立州政府 - 联邦EIN - 规章制度 - 利益冲突政策 - 募集资金证书 - 501c3申请

筹集你的第一笔资金。 - 信用卡交易 - 银行转账 - 苹果支付 - 谷歌支付 - Paypal & Venmo - 循环捐款

设置您的银行账户。 - 支票账户 - 虚拟借记卡 - Physical Debit Cards - Wire, ACH, Checks - Investment Account - FDIC Insured up to $250,000

For a limited time, we're waiving fundraising and banking stack pricing for a year for the first 25 charities, just make sure to sign up on the link below

We have a waitlist up on our website here: https://www.charitystack.com/sign-up
description_zh-Hant:
嗨，HackerNews！

我是CharityStack的創始人之一Mubarrat。CharityStack是一個平臺，任何人都可以組建一個非營利組織，籌集他們的第一筆資金，並建立他們的銀行賬戶。我們希望讓任何人和每個人都能無縫地啟動一個慈善機構併產生影響。

為什麼要建立CharityStack？ 在CharityStack之前，我和我的團隊曾試圖創建一個慈善機構，這絕對是一個糟糕的過程。我們花了將近兩年的時間，花了幾千美元，中間還經歷了一堆令人頭痛的事情。我們很快就意識到，我們並不是唯一有這個問題的人，而是每當有人試圖創建一個慈善機構時，都會普遍存在這個問題。

通過Charity Stack，你可以：

組建你的非營利組織。 - 成立州政府 - 聯邦EIN - 規章制度 - 利益衝突政策 - 募集資金證書 - 501c3申請

籌集你的第一筆資金。 - 信用卡交易 - 銀行轉賬 - 蘋果支付 - 谷歌支付 - Paypal & Venmo - 循環捐款

設置您的銀行賬戶。 - 支票賬戶 - 虛擬借記卡 - Physical Debit Cards - Wire, ACH, Checks - Investment Account - FDIC Insured up to $250,000

For a limited time, we're waiving fundraising and banking stack pricing for a year for the first 25 charities, just make sure to sign up on the link below

We have a waitlist up on our website here: https://www.charitystack.com/sign-up
